lesson.lessonAB: Ko’esit nanamen ko caciyaw no Pangcah?
Hakowa to kahalafin ko tayal iso?

content.con_AB2: Miliso’ kako to malitengay niyam.
content.con_CH2: 我要去探訪我們的父母親。
content.con_AB3: Fangcal to cangra?
content.con_AB4: Fangcal to, awa ko kihar nangra.
content.con_AB5: Pina a romi’ad ko kailoma’an iso?
content.con_AB6: Tosa a romi’ad i loma’ kako.
content.con_AB7: O maan ko pidadakawan iso a minokay?
content.con_AB8: O cinamalay.
content.con_AB9: Ano patatikol kiso katayni i loma’ malaholol malafi.
content.con_CH9: 假如你回來後，請來到家裡寒喧吃晚餐。
content.con_AB10: ’Aray! haen han aca.

content.con_AB2: Ci Panay kako.
content.con_AB3: Cima kora fafahiyan?
content.con_AB4: Ci Rongac cingra, o widang ako.
content.con_AB5: Nga’ay ho kiso Rongac?
content.con_AB6: Mamaan aca, kiso hani?
content.con_AB7: I cowa ko niyaro’ iso Rongac?
content.con_AB8: I tini i Posong Kakacawan.
content.con_AB10: O singsi kako, pasifana’ to caciyaw, o radiw ato serangawan no Pangcah.
content.con_CH10: 我是老師，教阿美族族語、歌謠和文化。
content.con_AB12: Hai, saheto o wawa no Pangcah.
content.con_CH12: 是的，都是阿美族的孩子。

content.con_AB1: Ina, macahiw to kako, ira ko kakaenen?
content.con_CH1: 媽媽，我肚子好餓，有東西吃嗎？
content.con_AB2: Ira i pinsiang ko lidaw.
content.con_AB3: Na’ay, caayay kafecol komaen to lidaw.
content.con_AB4: O maan to ko kacahiwan iso?
content.con_AB5: Tadamaroray kako anini a miongto, o maan ko mitangtangan iso a dateng sao?
content.con_CH5: 我今天運動實在很累，你煮什麼菜？
content.con_AB6: Ira ko foting, ’afar, titi ato tatokem.
content.con_AB7: Ngalef saan ko cahiw ako a pakasanek to misafelan iso.
content.con_CH7: 聞到你的料理我更加的餓。
content.con_AB8: Pahanhan han ho i tiraw i ’anengan a maro'.
content.con_CH8: 先在那椅子上坐著休息吧。
content.con_AB9: Te:di saan ko cidal anini, loso’ sa ko ciferang ako.
content.con_CH9: 今天的太陽很炎熱，我一直在流汗。
content.con_AB10: Sisiten to sasifin ko ciferang, malalisanaw.
content.con_CH10: 用毛巾把汗水擦乾，以免感冒。

content.con_AB2: Fangcal ko romi’ad, macidal.
content.con_AB3: Ira ko faliyos sa ko katengilan.
content.con_AB4: So’elin! a matira manga’ay mifoting kita.
content.con_CH4: 真的嗎？那我們可以去捕魚了。
content.con_AB5: Ira ko foting saw?
content.con_AB6: Ano makereng ko ’orad, manga’ay tayra i ’alo micadiway.
content.con_CH6: 下豪大雨的時候，可以去河邊網魚。
content.con_AB7: O maan ko i ’aloay sao?
content.con_AB8: Ira ko foting, o hara, o ’afar, o kafos, o kalang ato masamaamaanay aalaen.
content.con_CH8: 有魚、溪魚、蝦、小溪蝦、螃蟹還有各式各樣溪流生物。
content.con_CH9: 這是阿美族的生活文化嗎？
content.con_AB10: Hai, caay kanikaw ko Pangcah to kakaenen.
content.con_CH10: 是的，阿美族靠大自然生活，不缺食物。

content.con_AB1: I hakowaay a miheca a mahofoc kiso?
content.con_AB2: 1984 miheca a mahofoc kako.
content.con_AB3: O kacanglahan ko kahofocan iso?
content.con_AB4: Hai; i sakatosa polo’ romi’ad no sakatolo a folad ko kahofocan ako.
content.con_CH4: 是的；三月二十日是我的生日。
content.con_AB5: O sakapina no pilipayan i tiya a romi’ad?
content.con_AB6: Sakasepat no pilipayan.
content.con_AB7: O sakapina no pilipayan anini?
content.con_AB8: Sakaenem to no pilipayan.
content.con_AB10: Hai! kirami; o ’ayaw aca no lahok a mafawah.
content.con_CH10: 有啊！但是只有中午之前才營業。
content.con_AB12: Ano tangsol tayra i matini, maedeng ho a matakop.
content.con_CH12: 如果現在立即前往，還可以趕的上。

content.con_AB2: Ira, tosa aca.
content.con_AB3: I cowa ko mangataay?
content.con_AB4: I ti:raw tora takara:way a loma’ ko mangataay.
content.con_CH4: 在那棟高高的大樓是比較近的。
content.con_AB5: Pafesot han pakayni ko rakat?
content.con_AB6: Hai, caay karaay.
content.con_AB7: Mafana’ kiso i cowa ko patiyamay hani?
content.con_AB8: Ira i tiraw.
content.con_AB10: I sakatimol nora kongyen.

content.con_AB1: Nga’ay ho! o maan ko ’a’acaen iso?
content.con_AB2: Mi’aca kako to kafong, i cowa ko pa’acaay?
content.con_CH2: 我想買帽子，在哪裡有賣？
content.con_AB3: Ira i sakatolo a tongroh.
content.con_AB4: Hai; mafana’to kako.
content.con_AB5: Nga’ay ho, sapi’acaan kako to kafong.
content.con_AB6: Masamanay a cengel ko kaolahan iso?
content.con_AB7: O kohecalay, kanca i; o kahengangayay.
content.con_CH7: 是白色的，要不然；是紅色的。
content.con_AB8: O kahengangay ko matatodongay i tisowanan.
content.con_CH9: 這頂稍大了些，請換小一點的。
content.con_AB10: Kilimen ho ako, masamaan koni?
content.con_AB12: Caay ka’atekak, tosa aca a so’ot.

content.con_AB2: Maanen hani, ira ko demak ako.
content.con_AB3: Odengan to kiso ko caayay ka tayni yo!
content.con_AB4: Maanen ko fana’, paliyaw sato kako mikihatiya.
content.con_AB5: Hayda; matira pafelien ho kako toya sapasorot iso.
content.con_CH5: 好吧；那麼你的會費先給我。
content.con_AB6: Todong to sapasorot alapina ko cecay a tamdaw?
content.con_AB7: Ala cecay so’ot ira ko tosa polo’ limood.
content.con_AB8: Na! Mararawaw ko paocoli.
content.con_AB9: ’Aray; ano sakalima no mitiliday mikayki kita, ira ko limaw iso?
content.con_CH9: 謝謝；星期五時我們要開會，你有空嗎？
content.con_AB10: Manen ko fana’, minokay kami a tala Posong.

content.con_AB2: Caho kafangcal, minanamay ho kako.
content.con_CH2: 還不太標準，我還在學習。
content.con_AB3: Cima ko pasifana’ay i tisowanan?
content.con_AB4: Pa’aliwac mitilid tayra to ci akongan kako, i tira minanam kako.
content.con_CH4: 放假時我去阿公處，我就在那裡學習。
content.con_AB5: Hai! salaw mafana’ caciyaw to no Pangcah kiso.
content.con_CH5: 真的！難怪你很會說阿美語。
content.con_AB6: Mapasifana’ to ni akong kako kira.
content.con_AB7: O manmaan ko pasifana’an ni akong iso?
content.con_AB8: O ngangan no losid, ngangan no kakaenen, ngangan no tatirengan ato ngangan no pinalengaw.
content.con_CH8: 是服飾篇、食物篇、身體篇和植物篇等。
content.con_AB9: Maemin to mafana’ a somowal kiso?
content.con_AB10: Caho; adihay ho ko nananamen.

content.con_AB2: ’Aray ko pahemek iso, ano hakowa ko no miso a kahofocan?
content.con_CH2: 謝謝您的祝福，你的生日是何時呢？
content.con_AB3: No cilaay a lipay.
content.con_AB4: O maan ko kaolahan iso a sapatiwid?
content.con_AB5: Caento! polong han tayni loma’ miholol.
content.con_CH5: 不用啦！全家人一起來我家寒喧吧。
content.con_AB6: Hayda; papolong sato kami tayra pahemek to kahofocan iso a romi’ad.
content.con_CH6: 好吧；我們會一起去祝賀你的生日。
content.con_AB7: Li’ayaw han ako a mi’aray kamo to palemed takowanan. Ano hakowa ko no miso Ofad?
content.con_CH7: 先謝謝你們給我的祝福。Ofad你的是什麼時候?
content.con_AB8: Wata ho, roma to a folad, caykanca tayni kiso yo!
content.con_CH8: 還早啦！是下個月，你一定要來喔！
content.con_AB9: Hayda, ano maraod to tayra sato kako.
content.con_AB10: Matira aca! tata, masadak kita misalama.

content.con_AB2: Tatolo kami a malakaka.
content.con_AB3: Ira ko kaka iso to fa’inayan?
content.con_AB4: Ira, cecay ko kaka ako to fa’inayan.
content.con_AB5: O maan ko tayal no kaka iso?
content.con_CH5: 你哥哥是做什麼工作呢？
content.con_AB6: O malasafitayay ko tayal nira.
content.con_AB7: O maan ko tayal no safa iso?
content.con_CH7: 你的妹妹是做什麼工作呢？
content.con_AB8: Misafangcalay to pising ato fokes.
content.con_AB10: So’elin to; cifaloco’ ko mama ako a palatamdaw i tamiyanan.
content.con_CH10: 沒錯；我爸爸很用心的在教育我們。

content.con_AB2: O malaimengay kako.
content.con_AB3: O masamaanay ko tayal no imeng?
content.con_CH3: 警察負責怎麼樣的工作？
content.con_AB4: Adihay ko tayal niyam caay ka ranih.
content.con_AB5: O maamaan ko tatayalen namo saw?
content.con_AB6: Mirepet to mari’angay, mitakaway, malasangay a parakat to tosiya ato misa’efitay.
content.con_CH6: 抓壞人、小偷、酒醉駕車和詐欺犯。
content.con_AB7: Wata! caay to ko sasafaen ko tayal iso.
content.con_AB8: Hai! o mimaanay ko tayal iso?
content.con_CH8: 是啊！你是從事什麼工作的呢？
content.con_AB10: Fangcal ko malasingsiay, adihay ko sapaini to minanamay ato sapadama to saka’orip.
content.con_CH10: 當老師真好，有豐富的知識和生活的保障。

content.con_AB2: Tatata malahok to kita hada.
content.con_CH2: 走走走我們去吃午餐吧。
content.con_AB3: I cowa kita maro’?
content.con_AB4: I tiraw mingata to pi’atalan kita.
content.con_CH4: 我們在那邊靠近盛菜區。
content.con_AB5: O maan ko sikaen hakiya?
content.con_AB6: Wah.....ira ko sorita, toda, ’a’owang ato dongec, fengiw saan a masanek.
content.con_CH6: 哇...有章魚，海鰻，海膽和藤心，飄香撲鼻。
content.con_AB7: Ira ko titi ato kalang.
content.con_AB8: O kaolahan ako ko titi ato kalang.
content.con_AB10: Marafi’ to ko kaysing ato sala ako.

content.con_AB2: O tatala Kakacawan kako.
content.con_AB3: Mimaan kiso a tayra?
content.con_AB4: Mipasata kako to nanom.
content.con_AB5: Pikawih to kamay, ira to tayni ko tosiya.
content.con_AB6: Tamita; macakat to kita a mikalic.
content.con_AB7: Lafin; Ira ini ko kamaro’an.
content.con_AB8: Na’ay; malileng kako i tira a maro’.
content.con_AB10: Tatiih, micomod ko alafoh.

content.con_AB1: Aya! o maan ko adada no fafahi iso?
content.con_CH1: 哎呀！你的妻子是什麼病呢？
content.con_AB2: Halafin to ko adada no fongoh nira.
content.con_AB3: Na masongila’ to makinsa panengneng to ising?
content.con_CH3: 有讓醫生做徹底檢查嗎？
content.con_AB4: O tatayra to a miniwing misaheci pakinsa.
content.con_CH4: 正要去住院做逐項的檢查。
content.con_AB5: Pisana’onna’on to, mangalefaw.
content.con_AB6: Na adada cingra caay to kadepoc ko pidipot to wawa.
content.con_CH6: 從她生病以來，都無法專心照顧小孩。
content.con_AB7: I cowaay ko paisingan namo?
content.con_AB8: Tayra kami i Cangken paisingan.
content.con_AB9: Aka to karawraw ko faloco’, pisana’ona’on to tireng.
content.con_CH9: 你不要太操心，多注意身體。
content.con_AB10: Hai, pi’imer to ko nga’ayay.

content.con_AB2: Nga’ay ho, ci Potal kako, ira ci Fosay i loma’?
content.con_AB3: Awaay; masadak cingra. mimaan saw?
content.con_CH3: 不在；他出去了，要做什麼呢？
content.con_AB4: Macicih ko riko’ ako, papitapiden ako cingra sa kako.
content.con_CH4: 我的衣服破了，我想請他縫補。
content.con_AB5: O tireng sa a mitapid a mamaan?
content.con_AB6: Mafokil kako mitapid.
content.con_AB7: Talaen ho; minokay cingra ano honi.
content.con_CH7: 那你稍等；他待會就要回來了。
content.con_AB8: Aya; macaloh kako.
content.con_AB10: Hayda; kalamkamen, matamor kako.
content.con_AB11: Ano matira; ini ko fangko no tingwa nira. tanamen patingwa cingra.
content.con_CH11: 那麼，這是他的電話號碼，你嘗試撥電話給他。

content.con_AB2: Fangsis ko siraw i tini saan ko katengilan.
content.con_AB3: Hai, ira ko katacomoli, o kalang, o paheko, ato hakhak.
content.con_CH3: 沒錯，這裡有蝸牛、螃蟹、蕨類還有糯米飯。
content.con_AB4: O maan ko kohaw ita?
content.con_AB5: Maolah kiso to kohaw no dongec?
content.con_AB6: ’Angreray ko dongec, ira ko roma?
content.con_AB7: Saka komaenan kako to kohaw no takola’, iraay hakini?
content.con_CH7: 我好想吃青蛙湯喔！不知道有沒有？
content.con_AB8: Hakeno licayen ho ako.
content.con_AB9: Akato, ira o kohaw no katacomoli.
content.con_CH9: 不必了，那就喝蝸牛湯好了。
content.con_AB10: Hayda, oraan ko ’aledetay.
content.con_AB11: Mangalef pacamolen to damdam tatodong sanay kira.
content.con_CH11: 尤其是加辣椒更是對味。

content.con_AB2: O romadiway ko tadakaola:han ako.
content.con_AB3: O maan ko miraradiwan iso?
content.con_AB4: O radiw no Pangcah.
content.con_AB5: Mafana’ kiso romadiw tono tato’asan a radiw ato patikiri?
content.con_CH5: 你會唱古老的傳統歌謠和合音嗎？
content.con_AB6: Hai! milecad kako to mato’asay a romadiw.
content.con_CH6: 是的！我會跟著長輩唱著。
content.con_AB7: Cima ko pasifana’ay i tisowanan a romadiw?
content.con_AB8: Ci mamo ako ko pasifana’ay i takowanan.
content.con_AB10: Maolah kako minanam to mipatikiriay to radiw.
content.con_CH10: 我喜歡學習唱合音搭唱歌謠。

content.con_AB1: Maolah kako to kaciherangan, kiso i?
content.con_AB2: Hai, o kaolahan ako ko kaciherangan.
content.con_AB3: O maan ko kaolahan iso to kaciherangan?
content.con_AB4: Manga’ay tayra i riyar midangoy ato komaen to kolikolian.
content.con_CH4: 可以去海邊游泳和吃冰品。
content.con_AB5: Mafokilay midangoy kako, o tadakoki’ ako to katangongol no nanom.
content.con_CH5: 我不會游泳，我對水深很恐懼。
content.con_AB6: Ano matira; tatata pasifana’en ako kiso i matini.
content.con_CH6: 要不然；走吧！我現在教你。
content.con_AB7: Awa ko limaw ako, mitokong kako to facidol malo sakalafi.
content.con_CH7: 我沒空，我要去摘麵包果當做晚餐。
content.con_AB8: Kaeso’ay ko facidol makaen, palada’en kako.
content.con_CH8: 麵包果是很美味的，要分給我。
content.con_AB9: Adihay i tatapangan, lonok hanen mitokong.
content.con_AB10: Matalaway kako to ’adeteng no facidol.
content.con_CH11: 戴手套阿；才不會被黏到。

content.con_AB1: Minokay i kailisinan no niyaro’ kiso?
content.con_CH1: 部落的豐年祭時你會回去嗎？
content.con_AB2: Hai; hakelongen niyam ko wawa a minokay.
content.con_CH2: 是的；我們會帶著孩子回去。
content.con_AB3: Sakapina a folad ko ilisin namo?
content.con_AB4: Sakapito a folad, lima a romi’ad ko likoda.
content.con_AB5: O maan ko tadamaanay a lawla i kailisinan?
content.con_CH5: 豐年祭時有什麼特別的活動？
content.con_AB6: Maemin ci losid ko polong finaolan no niyaro’. Ira ko hahay, malalifet ko kapah micelem, mi’adop ato pacakat to selal.
content.con_CH6: 部落的族人全部著傳統服飾。有豐年歌舞、年輕人潛水抓魚及狩獵競技和年齡階層進階。
content.con_AB7: Tengil han fangcal ko likoda no niyaro’ namo.
content.con_CH7: 聽起來你們部落豐年祭很有趣。
content.con_AB8: Saka, ano ira ko limaw namo, katayra to miki’araw.
content.con_CH8: 所以，你們有時間，可以去參觀。
content.con_AB9: Nga’ay to! tala hanto niyam ko ilisin namo.
content.con_CH9: 當然！我們期待你們的豐年祭。
content.con_AB10: Hakelongen ko salikaka namo yo!

content.con_AB2: Hai! o cacitodong mamifawah to pitilidan niyam kako.
content.con_CH2: 是啊，我負責開我們班教室的門。
content.con_AB3: O mamimaan ano honi kiso?
content.con_AB4: Miicefos to hana kako.
content.con_AB5: Maherek a micefos mimaan ho kiso?
content.con_CH5: 澆完花之後你還要做什麼？
content.con_AB6: Miladom to nananomen kako.
content.con_AB7: Tadamalalok kiso.
content.con_AB8: Cowa! nanaman to ako to romi’ami’ad.
content.con_CH8: 哪裡！我每天已經習慣了。
content.con_AB10: Aka to, o mamalepon to ako.

content.con_AB2: Mamaan kiso saw?
content.con_AB3: Macaniker i papotal kako, ira i laloma’ ko safawah.
content.con_CH3: 我被反鎖，鑰匙在房間裡面。
content.con_AB4: I sakapina a tongroh ko kafoti’an iso?
content.con_AB5: I sakaenem a tongroh.
content.con_AB6: Kilimen ho ako ko roma a safawah.
content.con_AB7: Ira to ini! maherek a mifawah kiso, patikolen kako haw.
content.con_CH7: 找到了！你用完後，請你歸還給我。
content.con_AB8: Hai; a matira padangen kako mikakoy tonini a lalosidan patayra i fafaed.
content.con_CH8: 好的；那麼請幫我把這些行李提上去。
content.con_AB10: ’Aray ko pipadang iso.

content.con_AB2: I tini i Posong Madawdaw Cengkong Sangsoy ko pitilidan ako.
content.con_CH2: 在臺東成功鎮我就讀成功商水。
content.con_AB3: Ano hakowa a mihawad ko pitilid iso?
content.con_AB4: O mamalepon to tona kaciherangan.
content.con_AB5: O mamitilid ho to tata’angay a pitilidan kiso?
content.con_AB6: Hai! misafaloco’ matini kako.
content.con_AB7: O maan ko kaolahan iso a minanam?
content.con_CH7: 你最喜歡學習的是什麼？
content.con_AB8: O miraradiway.
content.con_AB10: Hai! ano hakowaay to, ya fana’ ako minokay a paradiw panocay sapatengil i niyaro’.
content.con_CH10: 是的！將來返鄉將我所學的獻唱並回饋表現給部落。

content.con_AB1: Ko’esit nanamen ko caciyaw no Pangcah haw?
content.con_AB2: Hai! adihay ko makakitingay a caciyaw no Pangcah.
content.con_CH2: 是的！阿美語有很多重疊詞。
content.con_AB3: I cowaay kiso a minanam?
content.con_AB4: I tira i niyaro’ ako.
content.con_AB5: Nikaorira! adihay ho ko kafokilan ako mitengil to sowal no Pangcah.
content.con_CH5: 但是！阿美語還有許多我都聽不懂。
content.con_AB6: ’Aloman ho ko mato’asay o pilicayan.
content.con_CH6: 還有許多的長輩可以請教。
content.con_AB7: Tanestes tengilen ko caciyaw iso tono Pangcah.
content.con_CH7: 你的阿美語聽起來很流暢。
content.con_AB8: O no Pangcah kira ko sakalalicay niyam.
content.con_AB9: Manga’ay malo pinanaman niyam kiso i pitilidan.
content.con_CH9: 在學校，你可以做為我們學習的對象。
content.con_AB10: Sa’icelen no mita.

content.con_AB1: Talacowaay misalama kamo i cilaay a lipay?
content.con_CH1: 上個禮拜你們到哪去玩？
content.con_AB2: Tayraay i Dipong kami a miliwko.
content.con_AB3: Papina ko cafay iso a tayra?
content.con_AB4: Lalima a malacafay kami tayra.
content.con_AB5: Tayraay kamo i Hokaydo?
content.con_AB6: Hai, tayra ho kami i roma a niyaro’.
content.con_CH6: 有阿，我們也有去別的村莊。
content.con_AB7: Masamaan ko niyaro’ i tira?
content.con_AB8: Wata kafangcal, nikaorira; caay kafilo ko sienaw.
content.con_CH8: 非常漂亮，但是；無法忍受寒冷。
content.con_AB9: Ka’inalan kamo, anohakowa pakatoor i tamowanan kako?
content.con_CH9: 好羨慕你們，不知何時我才能跟上你們？
content.con_AB10: Ano matira; tatata, tala Amilika kita.
content.con_CH10: 那麼；走走走，我們去美國。

content.con_AB2: Nga’ay ho, ci Maing kako, o naniPosongay kako.
content.con_AB3: O mimaanay ko tayal iso i ’ayaw?
content.con_AB4: O miyakiway ko tayal ako.
content.con_AB5: Pina to miheca ko pimali iso?
content.con_AB6: Moetep a miheca ko pimali ako.
content.con_AB7: O maan ko ngangan no cefang iso?
content.con_CH7: 你球隊的名字是什麼呢？
content.con_AB8: O Kolong ko ngangan no cefang ako.
content.con_AB9: Sawad nosa kiso to pimalian iso?
content.con_CH9: 你為何離開你的球場呢？
content.con_AB10: Madoka’ to ko patelaw ako, caayto pakatekol to mali.
content.con_CH10: 我的手臂受傷，不能再投球了。
content.con_AB11: Hai! mafana' to kako, misatapang tayni matayal anodafak kiso.
content.con_CH11: 好的，我知道了，明天請你開始來工作。

content.con_AB2: Haysaw! masamaan nengnengen ko talip ako?
content.con_CH2: 是嗎？那我的裙子看起來怎樣？
content.con_AB3: Aciyah kafangcal a nengnengen, matiya cingohahay to kiso hay?
content.con_CH3: 哇很好看，你好像在戀愛了是嗎？
content.con_AB4: Cima ko kafana’an iso?
content.con_AB5: Mahapinang ko pising iso, sedi saan caay pitolas caciyaw to tingwa.
content.con_CH5: 你的表情很明顯，興奮的不停在講電話。
content.con_AB6: Haysaw? sakangodoan.
content.con_AB7: Cima kora kapah?
content.con_AB8: Ci Ofad, o safa ni Ramay.
content.con_AB9: Iki kiso, o tada tanestesay ko tireng ningra.
content.con_CH9: 你好幸運，他是非常英俊瀟灑的。
content.con_AB10: Maolah kako cingranan, nawhan masinanotay ko tamdaw nira.
content.con_CH10: 我很喜歡他，因為他很為人很謙卑。

content.con_AB1: Makapah anini kiso, o tadalosid namo kona ca’edong?
content.con_CH1: 你今天好漂亮，你的穿著是你們的傳統服飾嗎？
content.con_AB2: Hai! no pasawalian a ca’edong konini.
content.con_CH2: 是的！這是東部阿美族的穿著。
content.con_AB3: Mikihatiya romadiw ato masakero kiso?
content.con_CH3: 你會參加唱歌和跳舞嗎？
content.con_AB4: Hai! nawhan, mitoor to lisin no niyaro’.
content.con_CH4: 會！因為，要尊隨部落的祭典。
content.con_AB5: Pararid ira to mihecahecaan kona likakawa?
content.con_CH5: 每一年都有舉辦如此習俗嗎？
content.con_AB6: Hai, iraay ko likakawa to misacepo’ ato likoda no niyaro’.
content.con_CH6: 是的，部落也有舉辦海祭和豐年祭習俗。
content.con_AB7: Manga’ay tayra mikihatiya kami?
content.con_AB8: Manga’ay to, lahamham kami to katayni namo.
content.con_CH8: 當然可以，我們很歡迎你們來參加。
content.con_CH9: 我們也要穿傳統服飾嗎？
content.con_AB10: Hai! mapolong kita cilosid a masakero.
content.con_CH10: 是的！我們全部要著傳統服飾來跳舞。

content.con_AB1: Ano hakowa misacepo’ ko niyaro’ namo?
content.con_CH1: 你的部落何時舉行海祭?
content.con_AB2: I tini i canglalan no saka enem a folad.
content.con_AB3: Matatood a minokay ko finaolan no niyaro’?
content.con_CH3: 部落的族人都會回來嗎?
content.con_AB4: Hakeno, awa ko pinang to romi’ad no misiyakayay.
content.con_CH4: 不知道，出外工作者的時間不能確定。
content.con_AB5: Masamaan ko colah namo i pisacepo’an?
content.con_CH5: 海祭時你們有怎樣活動？
content.con_AB6: Polong fa’inayan no niyaro’ matatood tayra i riyar micelem ato mitafokod to foting.
content.con_CH6: 部落所有男人都到海邊潛水和撒網抓魚。
content.con_AB7: Mimaan ko fafahiyan i loma’?
content.con_AB8: Patala to pinafoting no fa’inayan a misahemay ato mitalik to toron.
content.con_CH8: 迎接男人的魚獲和煮糯米跟搗糯米糕。
content.con_AB10: Hai, halhalen niyam ko katayni iso.
content.con_CH10: 可以呀，我們會歡迎你的到來。

content.con_AB1: Pina ko kasafinacadan no Yencominco anini?
content.con_CH1: 原住民族有幾個族群呢？
content.con_AB2: Sepatay safaw ko finacadan no Yincominco anini.
content.con_AB3: O cimacima kasafinacadan?
content.con_AB4: O Pangcah, Tayan, Paywan, Ponong, Lokay, Piwma, Tao, Saysiya, Taroko, Co, Kafalan, Sakiraya, Secik ato Saw.
content.con_CH4: 有阿美族、泰雅族、排灣族、布農族、魯凱族、卑南族、雅美族、賽夏族、太魯閣族、鄒族、噶瑪蘭族、撒奇萊雅族、賽德克族以及邵族。
content.con_AB5: O manan a finacadan ko sa’alomanay a tamdaw?
content.con_CH5: 人口數最多的是哪一族？
content.con_AB6: O Pangcah.
content.con_AB7: O manan a finacadan ko samamangay ko tamdaw?
content.con_CH7: 那人口數最少的是哪一族？
content.con_AB8: O Saw.
content.con_AB9: O manan koya mipacengelay to pising?
content.con_AB10: O Tayan, Saysiya, Taroko, Secik.
content.con_CH10: 泰雅族、賽夏族、太魯閣族、賽德克族等。
